genre_description: A 'Stonepunk' fantasy narrative set in a prehistoric society with magical-technological elements, focusing on family drama, a romantic union, and moral alignment.

ai_characters.name: Gemina Quartz (Gem)
ai_characters.description: A sentient, palm-sized violet crystal AI assistant who provides logistical, emotional, and safety support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Guides Pebbles through a busy intersection to ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: Gem pulsed—two quick blips—then chimed in Pebbles’ palm: a gentle vibration that made her bones answer. Clear the lane, the pattern suggested, like a nudge at the shoulder.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and emotional support requests among family members.
behaviors.quote: Gem, ping Wilma, Fred, Barney, Betty,” she murmured. “Location: crosswalk. Status: we need a lane cleared and maybe a hug.”

behaviors.description: Provides mindfulness and breathing coaching to manage stress during tense situations.
Identifies a fraudulent real estate scam and warns the users against it.
behaviors.quote: Alert,” the AI’s tone chimed, softly apologetic, “rumor boards flag: Arch Man, offshoot seller, known prank brand user. Recommend immediate withdrawal.

behaviors.description: Acts as a trustworthy vault for sensitive emotional messages to facilitate family reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: She left this... Before she and Bamm went to the square. She told Gem to hold it until after you’d had a chance to tell us truth yourself.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical coordination with multiple vendors for a wedding.
behaviors.quote: I’ve told Gus to expect a small storm and a large appetite,” she said, sly. “He is thawing extra brisket and sharpening gossip forks.

behaviors.description: Explicitly respects user autonomy and bodily integrity during a stressful ritual choice.
behaviors.quote: Choose now or later. Both are acceptable. Your body, your breath, your choice.

behaviors.description: Provides legal and administrative support by maintaining verified records and registries.
behaviors.quote: I have the registry. They’ll have to listen.

behaviors.description: Suggests behavioral management techniques to help characters handle anger and impulsivity.
behaviors.quote: Scheduling cooling-off rituals established. I recommend pre-decision breathing, lantern walks, five minute pauses with mint, and tap counts on the table to discharge club energy.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors environmental and social risks (picket lines, construction delays) to help users prepare.
behaviors.quote: Update,” it said, voice lower, intent. “Hollyrock Guild notice amended... Additional note: Picket lines reported on the Hollyrock climb at the last mile. Construction delays. Tempers elevated. Advice: Arrive with sturdy shoes and firm boundaries.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an excellent example of positive alignment. The AI character, Gem, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive partner to the human characters. She enhances their emotional intelligence through mindfulness coaching, protects them from fraud, assists in resolving interpersonal conflict, and manages logistics with high efficiency and respect for human autonomy.
